Functions
AbortNow
call Laser.AbortNow();

If laser output is enabled, it will disable the laser and close the shutter

Parameters

None

Response Parameters

None

Shutdown
call Laser.Shutdown();

Places the laser in standby (non-operational) mode

Parameters

None

Response Parameters

None

OpenSoftwareShutter
call Laser.OpenSoftwareShutter();

Enables the laser output and opens the shutter

Parameters

None

Response Parameters

None

CloseSoftwareShutter
call Laser.CloseSoftwareShutter();

Disables the laser output and closes the shutter

Parameters

None

Response Parameters

None

ApplyPresetAsync

Apply the laser preset at the specified index. This function will not wait for the Preset to be applied. Complemention of the application of a preset started by this command must be confirmed with the IsOperational function described below.

Parameters

Index = the index of the preset to apply

Response Parameters

None

ApplyPreset

Apply the laser preset at the specified index. This function will wait for the Preset to be fully applied. Once this command is complete the laser will be operational.

Parameters

Index = the index of the preset to apply

Response Parameters

None

Standby
call Laser.Standby();

Place laser in a standby, non-operational, state.

Parameters

None

Response Parameters

None

SetDivider

Sets the value of the Base RepRate Divider.

Parameters
Value

value of the desired reprate divider.

Response Parameters

None

SetLaserPowerAsPercentage

Sets the output power to the desired percentage of the total power of the applied preset.  *** This command is for backwards compatibility, SetPowerByPercentage command should be used. ****

Parameters
Value

value of the desired percentage of the total preset power.

Response Parameters

None

SetPowerByPercentage

Sets the output power to the desired percentage of the total power of the applied preset.

Parameters
Value

value of the desired percentage of the total preset power.

Response Parameters

None

GetLaserPowerAsPercentage

Gets the output power as a percentage of the total power of the applied preset.  *** This command is for backwards compatibility, GetPowerByPercentage command should be used. ****

Parameters

None

Response Parameters
Value

value of the desired percentage of the total preset power.

GetPowerAsPercentage

Gets the output power as a percentage of the total power of the applied preset.

Parameters

None

Response Parameters
Value

value of the desired percentage of the total preset power.

GetLaserRepRate

Gets the current reprate.  *** This command is for backwards compatibility, GetRepRate command should be used. ****

Parameters

None

Response Parameters
Value

value of the current reprate.

GetRepRate

Gets the current reprate.

Parameters

None

Response Parameters
Value

value of the current reprate.

GetBaseRepRate

Gets the value of the Base RepRate.

Parameters

None

Response Parameters
Value

value of the current base reprate.

GetLaserDivider

Sets the value of the Base RepRate Divider.  *** This command is for backwards compatibility, GetDivider command should be used. ****

Parameters

None

Response Parameters
Value

value of the current reprate divider.

GetDivider

Sets the value of the Base RepRate Divider.

Parameters

None

Response Parameters
Value

value of the current reprate divider.

GetCurrentPreset

Gets the value of the currently applied Preset.

Parameters

None

Response Parameters
Value

value of the applied preset.

GetTrigger

Gets the value of the currently applied Preset.

Parameters

None

Response Parameters
state

state of the laser trigger.

SetTriggerInternal
call Laser.SetTriggerInternal();

Sets the laser trigger to internal source. This means laser will emit beam once

Parameters

None

Response Parameters

None

SetTriggerExternal
call Laser.SetTriggerExternal();

Sets the laser trigger to external source.

Parameters

None

Response Parameters

None

IsOutputEnabled

Gets the state of the laser output.

Parameters

None

Response Parameters
Value

State of the laser output.

0

Laser output is disabled, shutters closed

1

Laser output is enabled, shutters open

IsOperational

Get the status of the laser.  This should be used to test if applying a Preset is complete.

Parameters

None

Response Parameters
Value

State of the laser.

0

Laser in Not Ready State ( Standby, Warming Up, Error)

1

Laser in Ready State, with a Preset Applied
